description: A continously updated list of Chamaecrista species with confirmed root nodulation and their bacteriod type.
Data from a study testing the effect of bee traits and behaviour on the reproduction of a single Chamaecrista species.
Data from a study testing the effect of rhizobium infection and soil type on the floral atractiveness of a single Chamaecrista species.
A time-calibrated phylogenetic tree of 231 Chamaecrista species based on six molecular markers.
